    • Method Detail

      • getMaximumTabsPerRow

        public int getMaximumTabsPerRow()
        Get the maximum number of tabs per row. If the number of tabs exceeds this number two or more rows of tabs are created to show all of them. This value is only valid when the tab overlay policy is TabOverflowPolicy.WRAP.
        Returns:
        Returns the maximum tabs per row, the default is Integer.MAX_VALUE.

      • getTabOverflowPolicy

        public TabOverflow getTabOverflowPolicy()
        Get the policy that will be used when the number of tabs are too many to display in one run.
        Returns:
        TabOverflow

      • setMaximumTabsPerRow

        public void setMaximumTabsPerRow(int maximumTabsPerRow)
        Set the maximum number of tabs per row. If the number of tabs exceeds this number two or more rows of tabs are created to show all of them. This value is only valid when the tab overlay policy is TabOverflowPolicy.WRAP.
        Parameters:
        maximumTabsPerRow - The maximum tabs per row, set to Integer.MAX_VALUE to always keep in one row.

      • setTabOverflowPolicy

        public void setTabOverflowPolicy(TabOverflow tabOverflowPolicy)
        Set the policy that will be used when the number of tabs are too many to display in one run.
        Parameters:
        tabOverflowPolicy - The policy as a TabOverflow instance.
